name: Naruto Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals: Hunting for Matsutake Mushrooms! / Lee and Neji Part Ways!
short_description: Naruto, Lee and the others go out hunting for matsutake mushrooms, but there are none to be found after an unusually hot summer. Later, Neji's finally had enough of being forced to cross-dress for Lee's skits.
